description: These vegetarian burgers get their intense flavour from the super-absorbent spelt. Roasting the vegetables before they are added to the burgers helps retain more of their flavour and keeps the unnecessary moisture out.
name: Veggie Burger With Spelt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Set the grill or griddle pan at its medium-low setting. Divide the mixture into 6 equal portions and form each into a 2.5cm thick patty. Grill the patties for about 5 minutes on each side, until crisp on the outside. Remove from the heat. Serve hot with burger buns, avocado, tomatoes, and onions.
